info.b: Convert your investment into passive earnings, make money work for you.

our_industries.b: Innovation is one of the main key points to stay one step ahead. Therefore, a comprehensive well-being is important as well as taking care of all aspects of the lives of our brand partners.
our_industries.c: At DigitalTrust, we fund extremely strong industries that are booming, such as the cultivation of medical cannabis, trading in different financial markets, health and wellness products with maximum absorption technology.

b: Your earnings are automatically credited to your DigitalTrust account every 24 hours.
Do not hesitate to contact our support team, your questions and requests are dealt with promptly.
You can withdraw your earnings at any time, which are sent to an external wallet, bank transfer or check in a maximum of one week.

c: Make a deposit to one or more memberships
Withdraw your earnings. And to enjoy...

b.a: How does your company make money?
b.b: We earn our commissions on whatever % we make above and beyond your dividend on a monthly basis.

Yes a 6 month holding period. Why? It gives us enough time to earn the returns guaranteed to you the investor on a monthly basis and makes us a profitable company. Can I liquidate before 6 months? Yes if emergency arises. We will need a hand written letter stating the reason and you will accrue a 25% penalty.

b.a: How will I receive my monthly dividends?
b.b: In the same way that you fund your account by bank transfer, check or bitcoins.

b.a: How long does it take to process a deposit/withdrawal request?
b.b: Deposits through electronic payment systems are processed instantly. Deposit requests through other payment systems are processed within 1-2 hours. The DigitalTrust Finance Department works 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The maximum time to process a withdrawal request through an electronic payment system is 48 hours from the moment of its creation. Bank transfers take 5-7 bank business days to process.

b.a: What payment methods can I use to add money to my account?
b.b: DigitalTrust offers different payment methods, including numerous electronic payment systems, credit and debit cards, bank transfers, and exchangers. DigitalTrust does not charge fees or commissions for deposits.

b.a: Are you a licensed and regulated investment company?
b.b: Yes we are an upstanding active US corp.

b.a: How long have you been in the business?
Will and when do I receive statements?
b.b: Yes. You can view your account online daily which is updated every 24 hours.

b.a: Is your company a full service brokerage firm?
b.b: No. We concentrate on portfolio management within the crypto markets as that´s where our expertise lies.
No. We aren´t CPA´S or accountants. You are responsible for your earnings and or profits according to your tax bracket. Please discuss with your personal accountant.

b.a: What are the Risks vs Rewards?
b.b: Well, first of all you are guaranteed to receive your monthly dividend on time indicated in your investment agreement. And your main investment will be returned at the end of the 10 months or 12 months.

b: The main mission of DigitalTrust Investments Corp is to provide its users with effective ways to receive royalty payments from the use of quantum technologies, cryptocurrencies, trading robots, professional traders, foreign money exchange markets, cannabis plantations in California, building commodities, health care and personal credit services in North and Latin America, as well as to grant its users with an exclusive access to its strategic partners' information.

However, being an open model in continuous evolution, we have several additional sources of income, which add up by giving support and strength to the economic engine of the project to make it sustainable over time, allowing our entrepreneurial community around the world to form a solid block creating new profit strategies.
Our portfolio allows us to have a very profitable business even in times of crisis, like now. This 2021 we start our international expansion program.
d: The MAIN GOAL of DigitalTrust Investments Corp. is to reach the capitalization value of our platform of 100 million dollars in the year 2021 and to grow its partner base to more than 10,000 by 2022 and to open new quotas for new investors every quarter of the year in progress.

In 2021 we have started our international expansion program that is looking for investors interested in earning between 1.1% and 2.75% per month of their invested capital by acquiring our digital licenses. If we calculate the numbers, that means between 13.2% and 27.5% per year of passive income deposited into your bank account each month. Where you have control of your account statements on a digital platform from a computer or mobile phone, being able to review the accumulation of your earnings, withdrawals, deposits, even the administration of our unique binary tree ecosystem of our marketing network paying three levels other than passive earnings being able to increase your paycheck month by month.

texts.text: DigitalTrust has two ways to register:
1) Contact us, we are at your service, we will create your account and you will be ready to invest.
2) You can be invited by a DigitalTrust member and start investing.
To invest and start earning in DigitalTrust, you must make a deposit. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your DigitalTrust dashboard you should see a shopping cart button.

2) After clicking on this button, you will see the membership options, you can choose a membership that you want to buy or deposit more in a membership that you already have. Select one, and click to button (+).

3) Enter the amount to deposit. Depending on the membership there are different minimum and maximum values. In case you are depositing into a membership that you already own, the minimum value is $ 100. Then select the payment method of your preference. You can make deposits with PayPal, Stripe or Coinpayments if you want to use your cryptocurrencies, in the latter case you must select the cryptocurrency to use between Bitcoin, Etherum and Tether USD. You also have the possibility of reinvesting your earnings with the Reinvestment option, but if you do not have earnings, the option will not be available yet. Confirm your transaction by clicking on "To pay" at the bottom.
4) Follow the steps proposed by each payment gateway, once the procedure has been carried out successfully, you will see your investment reflected on your dashboard.

sections.title: How do I withdraw my earnings?

texts.text: You can withdraw earnings from DigitalTrust whenever you want. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your DigitalTrust dashboard you should see your withdrawal information.

2) After clicking on this section, you will see the options that DigitalTrust has to send you your earnings. It is important that you fill in your profile details with the information necessary to send you the money. Select a method, and click continue at the bottom.

3) Enter the amount to withdraw. The amount available to withdraw depends on your available balance at the time. The available balance is all the profit that you have accumulated in your balance for at least one month. Confirm your deposit value and click Confirm at the bottom.
4) The DigitalTrust team will be notified of your withdrawal and will proceed to send you your earnings, once the procedure is successful, you will see your deposit reflected on your dashboard.

sections.title: How do I complete my profile data?

texts.text: It is important to have your profile data complete and updated, so we can send you your earnings in a more agile way. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your DigitalTrust dashboard you should see a sidebar on the left side or the menu button on the top right.
2) After clicking, you will be able to see the Setting option, click and you will be redirected to a form with your profile data
3) Update your details. Do not provide sensitive information, such as bank keys or passwords for your electronic wallet, add only the data necessary so that our team can send you your earnings
4) When finished, click Save and your profile will be updated..
